entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
